fields.description:
Kitchensink -Listview -Under SetItems, Animation style 'Fade' does not work.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Fetch kitchensink from https://github.com/vishalduggal/KitchenSink.git listview_tests.
2. Go to Kitchensink > Base UI > View >ListView> Set Items.
3. Click on 'Start test' button.
4. Observe the screen. The listview changes with the specified animation style.
5. Observe the Animation style 'Fade'.

Actual:
It does not show the screen as faded as its name specifies.

Expected:
It should show the screen as faded as its name specifies.
fields.summary: IOS: Kitchensink -Listview -Under SetItems, Animation style 'Fade' does not work.
fields.environment:
Tested with:
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130316201654
Studio: 3.0.2.201302191606
Device: iphone4S(v 5.1)
OS: OSX 10.7.5

comments.body: In order to see animation effects, you need to increase timer interval to e.g. 5s and use Debug/Toggle Slow Animations in iOS Simulator.

Tested, following Max' suggestion, using
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.3.201308302458
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.3.v20130904134612
KS[3_1_X]
https://github.com/appcelerator-developer-relations/KitchenSink/tree/3_1_X
Xcode5-DP6
CLI: 3.1.2
Alloy: 1.2.2
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS7(11A4449d)

Animation style 'Fade' works.
